SEARCH
Package com.csse3200.game.components.towers

Class TowerComponent

java.lang.Object
com.csse3200.game.components.Component
com.csse3200.game.components.towers.TowerComponent
public class TowerComponent extends Component
Component representing a tower entity, including its type and size. Handles tower attack logic, sell logic, and tower selection.
